desc: Using QuickBooks significantly simplifies bookkeeping, giving you the confidence to direct your full attention to running your business.
banner: Automate transfers to QuickBooks without manual input
Manage payment methods and oversee sales effortlessly
Record taxes with single, combined, or multiple rates
Customize your dashboard to fit your preferences

features.title: Easily transfer your sales data.
features.description: Eliminate wasted time on manual data entry with nightly transfers that seamlessly consolidate your sales information into the programs you currently use.
details: Transfer sales data effortlessly to QuickBooks Online, QuickBooks for Desktop, or Xero
Connect and move data to various destinations seamlessly

features.title: Monitor Payment Information
features.description: Manage your payments efficiently with CommerceSync's simplified tracking system.
details: Monitor payment methods and tax responsibilities using single, combined, or multiple rates
Record both complete and partial refunds in a specific income account for better organization

features.title: Customize Your Support
features.description: Receive fast and convenient support using CommerceSync's customizable dashboard.
details: Effortlessly reconcile credit settlements while enjoying 'after hours' support access
There are no caps or extra charges for synchronizing daily, monthly, or yearly sales

features.title: Increased Functionality with Additional Features
features.description: Simplify business management with fully automated capabilities to eliminate hassles.
details: Leverage the Customer Detail feature to track sales for each individual customer
Invoices are automatically revised to include discounts, tips, refunds, and other adjustments for greater efficiency
